replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
需要打上高清修復補丁... 

1. 用較新版的高清修復 MCPatcher HD fix 2.2.2
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-12712-1-1.html

2. 放棄MCPatcher, 改用OptiFine
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/249637-181-optifine-hd-d2-fps-boost-hd-textures/
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-12863-1-1.html
